text: Uye vanhu vake vakapokana naye, ndokubva ati: “Mungapokane neni maererano naAllah avo vave vanonditungamira, uye hapana kana chandinotya pane izvo zvamunovasanganisa nazvo (Allah pakunamata), kusara kwekuti kana Tenzi vangu vachida chimwe chinhu. Tenzi vangu ndivo vane ruzivo rwezvose. Ko hamurangarire here?”
